name: VR Real Car Drifting: Dubai Desert Race Pro
name_original: VR Real Car Drifting: Dubai Desert Race Pro
description:
Sick of Desert endless VR drift racing games with third person perspective?
We give you a top new VR drifting game to complete your drifting madness.
A fun addictive 3D VR race drift game!
Addictive, loving & full-time fun.
Get it to Check
How long can you survive?

Key Features;
FPS Game.
Involving game play. Beautiful eye looking 3D environment.
Ultra Realistic, Efficient and Perfect VR Game Play.
High Quality (HD) VR graphics.
Realistic to life sound effects.
Significant Characteristic;
No connectivity required while playing.


Important:
Tilt your head in the direction that you want to move/Drift the car.
Please leave your comments and thoughts. Your feedback is much more valuable to us...!!!
